restricted_zones.reason_for_restriction: Nature (Dense Jungle, Wild Animals), Proximity to International Border (Bhutan), Past Insurgency.
restricted_zones.restricted_timings: Entry prohibited from Sunset to Sunrise (approx. 5:30 PM to 6:00 AM). Night travel on approach roads is not advised.
restricted_zones.advice_for_tourists: Always use an authorized forest guide. Do not leave the designated safari trails. Avoid displaying valuables. Inform your hotel about your travel plans.

restricted_zones.reason_for_restriction: Nature (Dense Forest), International Border Sensitivity, Historically affected by insurgency.
restricted_zones.restricted_timings: Movement is strictly advised only during daylight hours (approx. 7:00 AM to 4:00 PM).
restricted_zones.advice_for_tourists: Travel in groups. Use official park vehicles. Check for the latest travel advisories from local authorities before visiting.

restricted_zones.area_name: Remote areas outside Haflong town (e.g., Maibang, Umrangso routes)
restricted_zones.reason_for_restriction: Insurgency (dormant but sensitive), Hilly & isolated terrain, Potential for opportunistic crime.
restricted_zones.restricted_timings: Strictly avoid road travel after 5:00 PM. Night travel is highly discouraged.
restricted_zones.distance_to_police_station_km: Varies (up to 50+ km from remote spots)
restricted_zones.advice_for_tourists: Travel only during the day. Use reliable and known transport operators. Avoid traveling alone. Keep police and local contacts handy.

restricted_zones.area_name: Kaziranga National Park (Animal Corridors on NH-37)
restricted_zones.reason_for_restriction: Nature (High-risk of animal-vehicle collision, especially rhinos and elephants).
restricted_zones.restricted_timings: Speed restrictions and no-stopping zones are enforced 24/7. Avoid travel on the highway stretch through the park late at night.
restricted_zones.distance_to_police_station_km: Varies, outposts are located along the highway.
restricted_zones.advice_for_tourists: Never get down from your vehicle in animal corridors. Adhere to speed limits strictly. Do not feed wild animals.

restricted_zones.area_name: Forest areas bordering Nagaland and remote interiors.
restricted_zones.reason_for_restriction: Insurgency (Historically active area), Ethnic sensitivities, Illegal resource extraction activities.
restricted_zones.restricted_timings: Road travel should be concluded by 4:00 PM. Night halts should only be at recognized towns like Diphu.
restricted_zones.advice_for_tourists: Foreign nationals may require permits. Travel with a local guide who is aware of the current situation. Avoid unplanned detours into forested roads.

restricted_zones.area_name: Areas bordering Bhutan and remote rural interiors.
restricted_zones.reason_for_restriction: Historically affected by insurgency and ethnic conflict, Border sensitivity.
restricted_zones.restricted_timings: Avoid travel after sunset (approx. 5:30 PM). Limit movement to main towns and highways.
restricted_zones.distance_to_police_station_km: Varies (up to 40 km from border areas)
restricted_zones.advice_for_tourists: Stay in well-known hotels. Be sensitive to local customs. Avoid discussions on political or ethnic issues. Keep travel documents secure.

restricted_zones.area_name: Nameri National Park & Forest Reserve (areas bordering Arunachal Pradesh)
restricted_zones.reason_for_restriction: Nature (Dense forest, River crossings, Wildlife), Interstate border sensitivity.
restricted_zones.restricted_timings: Park activities like rafting and trekking are restricted from 4:00 PM to 7:00 AM. Avoid border roads at night.
restricted_zones.advice_for_tourists: An armed forest guard is mandatory for trekking/walking inside the park. Follow all park regulations strictly. Be cautious of strong river currents.

restricted_zones.area_name: Dehing Patkai National Park & areas near the Arunachal/Myanmar border (e.g., Ledo, Jagun)
restricted_zones.reason_for_restriction: Insurgency (Historically used as transit routes), Nature (Extremely dense rainforest), Illegal mining activities.
restricted_zones.restricted_timings: All travel should be completed between sunrise and sunset. Night travel is extremely risky and not advised.
restricted_zones.nearest_police_station: Digboi Police Station / Ledo Police Station
restricted_zones.advice_for_tourists: Visit only with reputed tour operators. Foreign nationals must check for permit requirements. Do not venture into unmarked trails. Keep emergency contacts readily available.

restricted_zones.area_name: Areas along the Bhutan border, including Bornadi Wildlife Sanctuary.
restricted_zones.reason_for_restriction: International Border Sensitivity, Past insurgency, Human-elephant conflict.
restricted_zones.restricted_timings: Movement is not advised after 5:00 PM, especially in forested and border areas.
restricted_zones.advice_for_tourists: Be aware of elephant corridors and avoid them, especially in the evening. Use local guides for any excursions. Do not photograph border outposts.
